description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 4-port secure KVM and cables, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.
full_summary:
## [English text]
### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
#### Solicitation No. 2BH2123766/A
#### Department: Department of National Defence

We are issuing a Request for Quotation (RFQ) to procure 4-port secure KVM and cables. The RFQ description is as follows:

* Delivery destination: Ottawa, ON
* Delivery date: 90 federal government working days from contract award, or on or before March 31, 2023

The RFQ is governed by the following rules:

* All bids must be submitted to the P2P portal by the date and time indicated on page 1 of the RFQ.
* Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Required Documents and Information
All relevant documents, including bid instructions and the RFQ, are available on the P2P portal.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries related to this RFQ, please reach out to:

Michael Boualavong
Junior Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8
Phone: (613) 402-8895
Email: [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

#### Provisions
This procurement is covered by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## [French text]
### Avis de projection de marché (APM)
#### Numéro de sollicitation : 2BH2123766/ A
#### Ministère : Ministère de la Défense nationale

Nous lançons une demande de devis pour la fourniture de KVM sécurisés à 4 ports et câbles. La description de la demande de devis est la suivante :

* Destination : Ottawa, ON
* Date de livraison : 90 jours ouvrables du gouvernement fédéral à compter de l'attribution du contrat, ou le ou avant le 31 mars 2023

La demande de devis est soumise aux règles suivantes :

* Toutes les soumissions doivent être envoyées uniquement sur le portail APL avant la date et l'heure indiquées à la page 1 de la DDP.
